Class Intersection

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.Parent
javafx.scene.Group
com.simulus.view.intersection.Intersection
All Implemented Interfaces:
TileGroup, Runnable, javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
public class Intersection extends javafx.scene.Group implements TileGroup, Runnable
Contains all tiles belonging to the intersection. Is a runnable, allowing it to change the traffic lights according to the switchtime.

  • Constructor Details

    • Intersection

      public Intersection(int xPos, int yPos)
      Parameters:
      xPos - x coordinate of the top left tile of the intersection in the grid
      yPos - y coordinate of the top left tile of the intersection in the grid

  • Method Details

    • configureDialog

      public void configureDialog()
      Opens the configuration dialog for this intersection.

    • addTurningPaths

      public void addTurningPaths(Tile[][] m)
      Computes all turning paths available at this intersection. The paths are added to the intersection tile they start in.
      Parameters:
      m - The map of tiles for referencing the start and end tile

    • showAllPaths

      public void showAllPaths()
      Visualise all paths - used in debug mode.

    • hideAllPaths

      public void hideAllPaths()
      Hides the visualisation of the paths through an intersection. Is used when leaving the debug mode.

    • getTileAt

      public IntersectionTile getTileAt(double posX, double posY)
      Returns a the tile of the intersection at the given position.
      Parameters:
      posX - The x-coordinate of the desired tile.
      posY - The y-coordinate of the desired tile.
      Returns:
      The tile of the intersection at the given position.

    • run

      The run method to switch activate and switch the traffic lights
